channel.title: Source Sdk Question
channel.description:
how does portal display npcs and physprops in the portal?
does it use func_monitor is a new way or is it something completely different? thanks

item.title: Source Sdk Question
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
If I’m not mistaken, the Portal effect was done in code, but I’d say it does share some code with both func_monitor and func_camera.
You can’t replicate the portals properly in a map, and the code is only available to portal and it’s mods, but with enough trickery you could make the same effect, but you’d only be able to see through one portal at a time.

Read full topic
